subclassFeature.name: Path of the Experiment: Volatile Serum
entries: Choose one serum when you Rage; effect lasts until your Rage ends.

subclassFeature.name: College of Whistles: Whistle Companions
entries: Summon spectral companions for 1 minute; choose one benefit on summon.

subclassFeature.name: Harvest Domain: Blessing of the Field
entries: Bless a 10‑ft‑radius area for 1 hour; allies gain small benefits.

feat.name: Altered
entries: You have been changed through magic, science, or both.

entries.name: Aquatic Adaptation
entries: You can breathe water, and you have a swim speed equal to your speed.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: Your AC equals 13 + your Dexterity or Constitution modifier (choose). You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

entries.name: Natural Weapons
entries: Your unarmed strikes can deal 1d8 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, as appropriate.

entries.name: Night Vision
entries: You have darkvision out to 60 feet (or +30 feet if you already have it).

feat.name: Charm Twister
entries: You can weave blessings and hexes into wicker charms.

entries.name: Old Blessing
entries: You can cast {@spell bless} once without a spell slot (long rest). Ability: Int, Wis, or Cha (choose).

entries.name: Twisted Hex
entries: As a Magic action, imbue a charm to impose disadvantage on an ability of your choice; breaking save: Cha (DC 8 + PB + chosen ability mod). One charm at a time.

entries.name: Blood Lash
entries: Learn the {@spell Blood Bolt|TCM} cantrip (Int/Wis/Cha, choose).

entries.name: Bottled Life
entries: After a long rest, spend up to PB Hit Dice into a vial; a creature drinking it heals the total + its Con mod (usable until your next long rest).

entries.name: Two Cantrips
entries: Learn two Warlock cantrips (Int/Wis/Cha, choose).

entries.name: Level 1 Spell
entries: Choose a 1st‑level Warlock spell; cast once per short/long rest without a slot; can also use slots.

entries.name: Spell Change
entries: On level up, you can swap one spell chosen via this feat for another of the same level.

entries.name: Eldritch Word
entries: Bonus action: one creature within 60 feet must succeed on a Wisdom save (DC 8 + PB + ability) or be {@condition frightened} of you until the start of your next turn. Safe use: 1/short or long rest; additional uses deal 1d6 unavoidable necrotic damage to you.

entries.name: Shred Fate
entries: You always have {@spell bane} prepared (same ability). Cast once per long rest without slot; can also use slots.

entries.name: Bet Big
entries: Gain Heroic Inspiration when you: win a contested check, reduce a creature to 0 HP, or a creature fails a save you imposed (not vs. CR 0/PCs).

entries.name: Win Big
entries: Bonus action: expend Heroic Inspiration to gain temp HP equal to your level.

entries.name: Ghostly Touch
entries: When you damage a creature with Incorporeal Movement, ignore its resistances.

entries.name: Spirit Sense
entries: Bonus action: sense {@creature Undead} within 60 ft or Ethereal within 60 ft (distance + direction). 1/short or long rest.

entries.name: Divine Channel
entries: Gain one use of Channel Divinity usable only for Turn Undead (DC 8 + Wis + PB). If you already have it, add one use.

entries.name: Last Rites
entries: 10‑minute rite; prepare a Medium or smaller corpse with 10 gp of materials; it can’t become {@creature undead}.

entries.name: Dead Aim
entries: Bonus action: next time you deal damage to a creature before your next turn, ignore its resistances.

entries.name: Studied Quarry
entries: Advantage on checks to recall information about a creature.

entries.name: Desperate Detail
entries: Advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks.

entries.name: Iron Mind
entries: Advantage on saves vs. {@condition charmed} and memory read/alteration.

entries.name: Fool’s Mask
entries: While masked and in fool’s garb, you can get away with minor social transgressions (GM discretion).

entries.name: Jester’s Repartee
entries: Always have {@spell Tasha's hideous laughter} prepared (Int/Wis/Cha, choose). Cast once per long rest without slot; can also use slots.

entries.name: Inscrutable
entries: Creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks against you.

entries.name: Unremarkable
entries: While among at least two others of your type (size within 1 step), you can Hide from outside observers using Cha (Deception) without cover; moving >5 ft away reveals you.

entries.name: Cling to Life
entries: Add your Constitution modifier (min +1) to death saving throws.

entries.name: Enduring Vitality
entries: Effects that would instantly kill or drop you to 0 HP instead drop you to HP equal to your level (1/long rest).

entries.name: Swift Invocation
entries: Use an action to cast a spell with casting time of 1 minute (1/long rest).

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Book (personal notes), Ink, Ink Pen, Traveler’s Clothes, 11 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Artisan’s Tools (as below), Map (Druskenvald’s provinces), Traveler’s Clothes, 10 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

items: Ardengloom — Skill: History; Tool: Herbalism Kit
Astramar — Skill: Arcana; Tool: Navigator’s Tools
Bubonia — Skill: Medicine; Tool: Poisoner’s Kit
Chernabos — Skill: Deception; Tool: Calligrapher’s Supplies
Edwardia — Skill: Investigation; Tool: Tinker’s Tools
Enoch — Skill: Nature; Tool: Leatherworker’s Tools
Kalero — Skill: Performance; Tool: Musical Instrument
Olmarsh — Skill: Arcana; Tool: Cartographer’s Supplies
Nerukhet — Skill: Persuasion; Tool: Weaver’s Tools
Pholsense — Skill: Religion; Tool: Mason’s Tools
Picco — Skill: Performance; Tool: Woodworker’s Tools
Syndramas — Skill: Athletics; Tool: Cook’s Utensils
Zulrogg — Skill: Survival; Tool: Herbalism Kit

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Herbalism Kit, Dagger, Fine Clothes, Healer’s Kit, 3 Vials, 10 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Gaming Set (same as above), Caltrops, Fine Clothes, Fine Wine (bottle), 23 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Calligrapher’s Supplies, Costume (cult garb), Holy Symbol (Amulet: cult insignia), Traveler’s Clothes, (gp as printed); or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Notes
entries: Use the Cultist Affinity table in the source for recommended extra skill and language choices.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Alchemist’s Supplies, Manacles, Perfume (to cover chemical smell), Traveler’s Clothes (with hooded cloak), 5 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Smith’s Tools, Bullseye Lantern, Fine Clothes, Oil (3 flasks), 5 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Additional Skill Choice
entries: Choose one from: Arcana, History, Religion, or Nature.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Leatherworker’s Tools, Book (one creature type), Hooded Lantern, Hunting Trap, Oil (3 flasks), Traveler’s Clothes, 8 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Disguise Kit, Mirror, Traveler’s Clothes, 16 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Mason’s Tools, Hooded Lantern, (protective gear as printed), 10 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Recommended Language
entries: Abyssal is recommended by the source.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Musical Instrument (same as above), Ball Bearings, Costume (jovial character with a laughing mask), Hunting Trap, Manacles, 3 Torches (for juggling), Traveler’s Clothes, 10 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Recommended Language
entries: Deep Speech is recommended by the source.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Calligrapher’s Supplies, Book (a topic of arcana), Ink, Ink Pen, Lamp, Oil (3 flasks), Paper (10 sheets), 2 gp; or (B) 50 gp.

entries.name: Equipment
entries: Choose (A) Quarterstaff, Weaver’s Tools, Basket (with dry reeds ready to weave), Book (druidic lore), Iron Pot, Traveler’s Clothes, 19 gp; or (B) 50 gp.
